vm.label: Virtual machine on which to mount a CD-ROM

GENERATED_6aa4383c-c516-4a1f-953d-d1bc03.default:
'connectAtPowerOn' field is ignored when selecting  "Client Device" device type.

'filePath' field is only taken into account when selecting "Datastore ISO File" device type.

filePath.label: ISO file path in datastore file format, for example [MY_DATASTORE] data/image.iso
